title: First Creatio app development | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.1 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.1 App description 1. Create a section 2. Add data 3. Implement the validation 4. Implement the page population 5. Implement a web service
markdown:

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/dev/development-on-creatio-platform/category/app-development)** (8.3).
